alert.note: Alert for Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 4:00PM CDT until March 31 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Eastern Poweshiek County in central Iowa... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Brooklyn, or 9 miles north of Montezuma, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Broadcast media confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * The tornado will be near... Victor, Victor and Hartwick around 410 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 187 and 204. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
